body:
Just threw in a couple good 1v1s that I won and decided to do some work with transitions and a lens flare. I still need some practice with SFX on Sony Vegas, but I didn't want to add too much and ruin the vid. Thanks for watching! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=afqayXiE_y0

Just kinda felt like uploading. 

My legit Montage is 80% done
